h2_title: Where to Find the Macaque Chief
content: Luckily, the Macaque Chief is just as prone to staggering as he was before, even more-so now thanks to the combined efforts of you and your ally, you can repeatedly knock him out of certain moves with well-times heavy hits that sends him toppling to the ground. A single focus point is you need to poke him off his sword when he stands on it!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Macaque_Chief.md', within the main section titled 'Macaque Chief', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Macaque Chief' and the sub-subsection 'Final Encounter - Mahavira Hall'.
The content is as follows:
Luckily, the Macaque Chief is just as prone to staggering as he was before, even more-so now thanks to the combined efforts of you and your ally, you can repeatedly knock him out of certain moves with well-times heavy hits that sends him toppling to the ground. A single focus point is you need to poke him off his sword when he stands on it!
